EmailTemplate.subject: School Times and Contact Details
EmailTemplate.textOnly:
British International School Kuala Lumpur Part of The British Schools Group
Dear {!Contact.Salutation} {!Contact.FirstName} {!Contact.LastName},
We hope you are well and that your children have enjoyed their first week back at school. Please be reminded that on Fridayâ€™s school finishes at 2pm. Parents are also asked to keep the school informed of any changes that may occur to contact details. Please inform the school administration department of any changes as soon as possible so that we can update our records. Thank you.
Kind Regards,
Administration Team The British International School of Kuala Lumpur World Class Education
__________________________________________________________ Beijing - Kuala Lumpur - Sao Paulo - Manila - Moscow - Guangzhou - Nanjing - Tashkent - Pamplona -Marbella
